overview: Four different stories about people who have one thing in common: the Stones. An office worm rushing to work, a grown-up girl who considers herself a child, looking for new friends, girlfriends who want to smoke a brick, a strange person who decided to become a rock in the park. Each of them has no idea what awaits them when they meet a motionless boulder. But the lives of the heroes may change greatly after what happened to them on the rocks.
title: Stones
